---
title: "watch_logs_and_wait"
description: "Execute a task with the agent and wait for completion"
---



This is an async method that watches logs and waits for the agent to complete.



## Parameters

<ParamField path="agent_id" type="str" required>
</ParamField>

<ParamField path="session_id" type="str" required>
</ParamField>

<ParamField path="log" type="bool" default="True">
</ParamField>

## Returns

[`AgentStatusResponse`](/sdk-reference/misc/agentstatusresponse): The response from the completed agent execution.
